channel.title: [Req] Windmills of your Mind - Great song
channel.description:
[Req] Windmills of your Mind - Great song
Song on Wikipedia: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Windmills_of_Your_Mind
This song was originally made for the movie The Thomas Crown Affair starring Steve McQueen, but I can't find the song on Google nor on www.dizzler.com. I'm looking for the original one. Not the ones by the Allison Moyet or the Sting. The original was by "Alan Bergman, Marilyn Bergman and Michel Legrand and performed by Noel Harrison."
Cookies for you if you can get it. :D Thank you!
PS: Don't upload it since Mopar doesn't want anything illegal on the forums, so if you can find it, just link to it. :)

Ah, think this is the one.
